prompt: A sprawling 5BHK luxury villa for a 60x80 feet plot in Delhi, featuring a double-height living room and an internal courtyard.
scratchpad: This is a high-end luxury project on a large 4800 sq ft (60x80) plot. The defining features are a double-height living room and an internal courtyard. These features dictate the layout. The courtyard will be the central element, with other spaces organized around it to provide views and natural light. Ground Floor: A grand entrance foyer. A large, double-height living room, likely in the north or east for good light without harsh sun. The kitchen, dining, and a guest bedroom suite will also be on the ground floor. The kitchen will be in the SE. First Floor: The upper floor will have a gallery/bridge overlooking the double-height living room and the courtyard. The master suite will be in the SW, with the other bedrooms arranged to have views into the courtyard or outside. The large plot allows for generous room sizes, walk-in closets, and large bathrooms. The plot is ~18288mm x 24384mm.
